mapper.sql: from core.client_metadata cm join core.client c on cm.client_id = c.id
join core.event_metadata em on cm.base_entity_id = em.base_entity_id
mapper.select: select client_id from core.client_metadata${postfix} cm where cm.base_entity_id = #{baseEntityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cm.date_deleted is null limit 1
select c.id, c.json from core.client${postfix} c where c.id = #{clientId} limit 1
